videos.title: Course Introduction
videos.desc: Learn what this Python course covers and how it will benefit you.

videos.title: Python Basics
videos.desc: Get started with Python by learning the basics of the language.

videos.title: Operators
videos.desc: Understand Python operators and their use in expressions.

videos.title: Data Types
videos.desc: Learn about Python data types, including numbers, strings, and booleans.

videos.title: User Input
videos.desc: Explore how to take input from users in Python programs.

videos.title: Lists & Tuples
videos.desc: Learn how to work with Python lists and tuples for ordered data.

videos.title: Dictionaries and Sets
videos.desc: Understand dictionaries and sets for managing unique and key-value data.

videos.title: Loops
videos.desc: Master Python loops such as for and while to iterate over data.

videos.title: Functions
videos.desc: Learn how to define and use functions in Python.

videos.title: Recursion
videos.desc: Understand recursion and how it works in Python programs.

videos.title: Scope
videos.desc: Explore Python variable scope, including local and global variables.

videos.title: Closures
videos.desc: Learn about closures and how they are used in Python.

videos.title: f-Strings & String Formatting
videos.desc: Discover modern string formatting techniques in Python.

videos.title: Modules
videos.desc: Learn how to use Python modules to organize and reuse code.

videos.title: Command Line Arguments
videos.desc: Work with command-line arguments in Python.

videos.title: Challenges & Practice
videos.desc: Solve coding challenges to practice Python concepts.

videos.title: Lambda & Higher Order Functions
videos.desc: Learn about lambda expressions and higher-order functions in Python.

videos.title: Classes & Objects
videos.desc: Understand object-oriented programming with classes and objects in Python.

videos.title: Exceptions & Errors
videos.desc: Handle exceptions and errors in Python programs.

videos.title: OOP Projects
videos.desc: Build projects using object-oriented programming in Python.

videos.title: Venv and Pip
videos.desc: Learn how to manage Python packages with venv and pip.

videos.title: Files
videos.desc: Work with files in Python for reading and writing data.

videos.title: Final Project
videos.desc: Apply what youâ€™ve learned in a final Python project.

6i3e-j3wSf0.description: Write a Python program to display 'Hello, World!'

fLAfa-BQtOQ.description: Write a Python program to calculate the sum of two numbers.

7BxUaeROVXI.description: Write a Python program to demonstrate the use of arithmetic operators.

starterCode.python:
a = 10
b = 3
print('Addition:', a + b)
print('Division:', a / b)

INGJh9DEaBM.description: Write a Python program to demonstrate different data types.

starterCode.python:
a = 42
b = 3.14
c = True
print(type(a), type(b), type(c))

N94vSNBF-EI.description: Write a Python program to take user input and display it.

starterCode.python:
user_input = input('Enter something: ')
print('You entered:', user_input)
starterCode.javascript:
let userInput = prompt('Enter something:');
console.log('You entered:', userInput);
starterCode.php:
<?php
fwrite(STDOUT, 'Enter something: ');
$userInput = trim(fgets(STDIN));
echo 'You entered: ' . $userInput . PHP_EOL;
?>
